channel.title: network on Pilvilinna
channel.description: Recent content in network on Pilvilinna

item.title: Reflections - Internet
item.description: Internet connectivity – 1 Gbit/s must have one. In our current apartment the options are somewhat limited, most of the carriers offer just VDSL (or 4G/5G) but luckily there’s HFC cable TV network and DNA offers 1 Gbit/s service over it.

item.title: Reflections - Wired networking
item.description: Networking – let’s think about cables first. In our current apartment we have ethernet wall plates around the apartment but as this has been built around 15 years afgo, the cabling is probably Cat5e as it cannot handle anything above 1 Gbit/s that well.
